Strings.Text: {scroll 0}\nThat's right!{scroll 1}{clear 35}{scroll 0}This is the ultimate life\nform. Tyrant!!{scroll 1}{timed 114}
{scroll 0}\nThis is your savior?{scroll 1}{clear 75}{scroll 0}You say this failure,\nis your savior?{scroll 1}{timed 168}
{scroll 0}\nYou can make sure yourself,{scroll 1}{clear 75}{scroll 0}whether Tyrant is a failure\nor not.{scroll 1}{timed 100}
{scroll 0}Go to hell!\nJill will join you too.{scroll 1}{timed 115}
{scroll 0}You don't mean you're\nexperimenting on real people?{scroll 1}{timed 116}
{scroll 0}\nThis is really beautiful!{scroll 1}{clear 95}{scroll 0}\nAll this power will be mine!{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nDon't be upset.{scroll 1}{clear 45}{scroll 0}All weak people exist\nto be eaten.{scroll 1}{timed 108}
{scroll 0}\nCan a creature like this{scroll 1}{clear 50}{scroll 0}really be the ultimate\nbiological weapon?{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}That must be the computer\nfor monitoring this creature.{scroll 1}{timed 115}
{scroll 2}It looks like the control\ndevice for this room...{clear 0}{scroll 2}But there's no time to\noperate it!
{scroll 2}It looks like the control\ndevice for this room...{clear 0}{scroll 2}There's a door lock switch...\nWill you unlock it?{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 2}It looks like the control\ndevice for this room...{clear 0}{scroll 2}A door lock device...\nUnlock the door?{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 2}It looks like the control\ndevice for this room...
